overview:
Derek is Chief Technical Officer of Aptimize. He has a background in commercial software development since 1991.

Derek has significant hands-on experience designing and building enterprise class software systems. In his role as a technical consultant, he has previously worked with many high profile New Zealand private and public sector organizations.

He brings a wealth of knowledge to Aptimize in the application of established and emerging development patterns & practices, a solid grasp of applying agile product development methods, and experience in coaching high performance project teams.

Derek is the inventor and principle developer of the core Website Accelerator technology.
